name: Operation Breakout
description: A fantastic FPS to play together with your friends or alone.Go into the savage world of Operation Breakout and get yourself to the top!A great game without Pay2Win!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (build 10586), 64-bit Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2500K CPU @ 3.10GHz Memory: 8.0 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 12 GB available space Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (build 10586), 64-bit Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2500K CPU @ 3.30GHz Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 12 GB available space Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
